text: Pour le menu di midi avec service rapide et ce qui ressemble le plus à de la bouffe maison... c'est bon.

A family environment with great service.  The menu is one of the better selections I have found so far in the city.  The poutine is delicious in comparison to others I have tried in the vicinity. Always a great stop for a decent burger after a round of golf.  Located next to Boston Pizza and easy to find/easy to park.  Dinner for two will be about $30-$40 CAD for two hungry people.  The last time I visited they were advertising goose pie.  Not something I see much here in the Boston area.  I might try it next time.

Un classique dans la restauration du type brunch. On retrouve les Normandins dans des régions précises au Québec : Québec, Mauricie, Chaudière-Appalaches, Centre-du-Québec, Montérégie, Bas-St-Laurent, Estrie. J'en ai essayé plusieurs, le plus près demeure pour moi celui de Ste-Julie.

Le menu est varié, du déjeuner classique aux crêpes, avec smoothies, cafés, etc... Le service est toujours excellent, les employés sont attentionnés et courtois. Vous en redemanderez ! Choisissez vos heures car il y a souvent affluence et c'est là que le service ralenti un peu. Si vous avez faim, ça peut influencer votre expérience !


A classic in the field of brunch restaurants. You will find Normandins in many regions in Québec, precisely : Québec, Mauricie, Chaudière-Appalaches, Centre-du-Québec, Montérégie, Bas-St-Laurent, Estrie. I've tried many places, but the nearest for me is the one in Ste-Julie.

The menu is great, various classics from basic eggs to pancakes, smoothies, coffees, etc... Fast service and curtious staff well organized. You'll ask for more ! Pike your time because you can be surprised how crowded it can be sometimes, then the service slows down and it could affect your experience !
